title: 104_hr278
content: Federal Support Payment Act - Amends the Federal judicial code to: (1) provide for the registration and enforcement of child support orders in States outside the State in which the order was made. (2) require notice of such registration and enforcement to be provided to the original court. And (3) grant State courts original jurisdiction of civil actions brought by a citizen of another State to order a citizen of the State in which the court is located to make payments periodically to such citizen's child if under the law of such State a State court is authorized to make such an order.
